components.tagline: Pwease Mr. Obama, may I have a job?
components.summary:
What if you could fill out a few simple questions and have the perfect resume that reflects your half-assed attitude?
Website to take in information from a user through a form and uses PHP to generate a resume with the provided information. All information missing will be filled in with random content (ex. 19 years of experience in breathing). The site allows the user to download the resume as a pdf... with the download button in it.
Created for Terrible Hacks XII.

right: Created content for the randomized hobbies.
Implemented ability to download webpage as pdf.
Set up PHP to transfer data between form and resume.
Created the form to take in user data.

components.title: Key Takeaways
list: All members expanded knowledge of web development.
Organization of group members to focus on individual portions that suited their abilities.
